long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Forum Mafia Utilities is a client-side script written for the Forums of Loathing. It alters the forum interface and offers various features to make playing, following, or hosting forum mafia games more streamlined
